sense.gloss: warrior (esp. of military retainers of daimyos in the Edo period), samurai
man in attendance (on a person of high standing), retainer
instructor at the imperial court (ritsuryō period)
pitch and length marks (to accompany a Buddhist liturgical chant, etc.)
tax counsellor, tax counselor, licensed tax accountant

sdata.j: ↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓が↑乱気流↑↓らんきりゅう↓に↑近付↑↓ちかづ↓いていたため↑操縦↑↓そうじゅう↓↑士↑↓し↓は↑乗客↑↓じょうきゃく↓にシートベルトを↑締↑↓し↓めるよう↑呼↑↓よ↓びかけた。
sdata.e: As the plane was approaching turbulence, the pilot asked the passengers aboard the plane to fasten their seat belts.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑非常↑↓ひじょう↓に↑優秀↑↓ゆうしゅう↓な↑弁護士↑↓べんごし↓になれる↑気↑↓き↓がする。
sdata.e: I have a feeling you'll be a very good lawyer.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑弁護士↑↓べんごし↓に↑相談↑↓そうだん↓した↑方↑↓ほう↓がいい。
sdata.e: Better to get advice from your lawyer.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑行動↑↓こうどう↓は↑紳士↑↓しんし↓らしくない。
sdata.e: Your conduct doesn't become a gentleman.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓、↑富士山↑↓ふじさん↓を↑見↑↓み↓たことあるかい。↑言葉↑↓ことば↓では↑言↑↓い↓い↑表↑↓あらわ↓せないほどの↑美↑↓うつく↓しさだよ。
sdata.e: Have you ever seen Mt. Fuji? It is beautiful beyond description.
